scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -u campaign_analysis -n campaign_analysis -o build/campaign_analysis.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/campaign_analysis.js -c -m -o build/campaign_analysis.min.js && rm -f build/campaign_analysis.zip && zip -j build/campaign_analysis.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/campaign_analysis.js build/campaign_analysis.min.js
